entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Lac Raglan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:09 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending early this evening then a few flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
